summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Carr Place from the south line of Blk 40 Lake Union Addition to No. 39th Street in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 16467, creating Local Improvement District No. 1524 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
